name: CubeOblocks (early alpha)
description:
CubeOblocks is currently in an early alpha stage. More features will be added soon.

Next Planned Update Date: January 20-31st (around that time)

YouTuber I used to help make my game: https://www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys

The character is inspired by the character in DynaBlocks (early Roblox)

Windows Support  For CubeOblocks is Here! 

There will possibly soon be a paid launcher for CubeOblocks that includes every version (even private versions!). If this does come out, don't worry CubeOblocks will still be free. (unless you want the paid version).

Local Co-Op Multiplayer will come out soon!
